reviews.review: Если не играть то игра топ
ТОлько в этой игре можно выиграть 8 игр без поражений , апнуть  звание и в некс катке ташить 30+килов но проиграть из-за двуг тимейтов и вконце концов понизить в ранге за 1 луз
melhor fps em modo multiplayer não há!
the best multiplayer game ever to be designed.
igra dlya dэbilov! ( ny ladno po fanu goditsa )

Gran juego competitivo, como el clásico pero con muchas mejoras en cuanto a dinámicas. 100% recomendado y lo único malo es el anticheat de Valve por lo demás todo ok.

im not that good at the game, but its really fun to play and im almost always having a blast XD

no one fucking asked for patches that are fucking useless and new buy menu, focus on important shit like why the fuck do i miss my no scope shot at point-blank range? what the fuck have u done to this game? just fucking thirsty fat idiots (at valve) that dont care about the game logistics only about the money. 

what cunts dont get this game if u dont like hackers and obvs shots that somehow miss.
its a good game only there are a lot of people cheating so that ruins the fun a lot
